mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM pur_stock a WHERE a.stock_state = 1
AND a.expire_date <= date_format(date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH) ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND a.expire_date IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(a.expire_date) != 0
AND (a.expire_date > date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') OR a.expire_date IS NULL OR LENGTH(a.expire_date) = 0)
AND ( a.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR LOWER(a.abbr_pinyin) LIKE concat('%', LOWER(#{keywords}), '%') OR UPPER(a.full_pinyin) LIKE concat('%', UPPER(#{keywords}), '%') )

SELECT a.pur_stock_id purStockId, a.item_name itemName, d.dict_name dictName, a.batch_number batchNumber, a.expire_date expireDate, CONCAT(0 + CAST(a.stock_count AS CHAR),'（',a.stock_unit_name,'）') stockCount, REPLACE (FORMAT(a.selling_price, 4),',','') sellingPrice FROM pur_stock a, sys_dictionary d WHERE a.stock_state = 1
AND a.expire_date <= date_format(date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH) ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND a.expire_date IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(a.expire_date) != 0
AND (a.expire_date > date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') OR a.expire_date IS NULL OR LENGTH(a.expire_date) = 0)
AND a.item_type = d.dict_value AND d.dict_key = '${@com.littledoctor.clinicassistant.common.constant.DictionaryKey@ITEM_PMFL}' AND d.is_use = 1
AND ( a.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR LOWER(a.abbr_pinyin) LIKE concat('%', LOWER(#{keywords}), '%') OR UPPER(a.full_pinyin) LIKE concat('%', UPPER(#{keywords}), '%') )
LIMIT ${offset},${pageSize}

SELECT a.item_name itemName, f.dict_name itemType, b.pur_order_code purOrderCode, b.pur_order_date purOrderDate, d.supplier_name supplierName, CONCAT(0 + CAST(c.pur_count AS CHAR),' ',c.pur_unit_name) purCount, REPLACE(FORMAT(c.unit_price,2),',','') unitPrice, REPLACE(FORMAT(c.total_price,2),',','') totalPrice FROM pur_stock a, pur_order b, pur_order_detail c, pur_supplier d, sys_dictionary f WHERE a.pur_stock_id = #{purStockId} AND a.pur_order_id = b.pur_order_id AND a.pur_item_id = c.pur_item_id AND b.supplier_id = d.supplier_id AND a.pur_order_id = c.pur_order_id AND f.is_use = 1 AND f.dict_key = '${@com.littledoctor.clinicassistant.common.constant.DictionaryKey@ITEM_PMFL}'

SELECT count(1) FROM pur_stock a, item_purchase b WHERE a.item_id = b.item_id AND a.stock_count <= b.stock_warn AND a.stock_state = 1
AND ( b.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') OR LOWER(b.full_pinyin) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{keywords}), '%') OR UPPER(b.abbr_pinyin) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{keywords}), '%') -- OR b.barcode = #{keywords} )
SELECT count(1) FROM pur_stock a WHERE a.stock_state = 1

SELECT a.pur_stock_id purStockId, a.item_id itemId, b.item_name itemName, c.dict_name itemType, a.expire_date expireDate, CONCAT(0 + CAST(a.stock_count AS CHAR),'（',a.stock_unit_name),'）') stockCount, CONCAT(REPLACE(FORMAT(e.unit_price,2),',',''),'/',e.pur_unit_name) unitPrice, REPLACE(FORMAT(e.unit_price / b.unit_convert * a.stock_count,2),',','') loss FROM pur_stock a, item_purchase b, sys_dictionary c, pur_order_detail e WHERE a.stock_state = '3' AND c.is_use = 1 AND c.dict_type = 2 AND c.dict_key = 'CGPMFL' AND a.item_id = b.item_id AND b.item_type = c.dict_value AND a.pur_order_id = e.pur_order_id AND a.item_id = e.item_id

SELECT b1.item_id itemId, b1.item_name itemName, b1.poisonous poisonous, b1.usage_and_dosage usageAndDosage, b1.taboo taboo, b1.stock_unit stockUnit, a1.selling_price sellingPrice, a1.stock_detail_id stockDetailId, a1.stock_count stockCount FROM ( SELECT b.item_id, b.item_name, b.poisonous, b.usage_and_dosage, b.taboo, b.stock_unit FROM item_purchase b WHERE b.item_name = #{medicalName} AND b.item_type = 1 ) b1, ( SELECT a.item_id, a.selling_price, GROUP_CONCAT(a.stock_detail_id ORDER BY a.stock_detail_id) stock_detail_id, SUM(a.stock_count) stock_count FROM stock_detail a WHERE a.stock_count > 0 AND a.stock_state = 1 GROUP BY a.item_id, a.selling_price ) a1 WHERE b1.item_id = a1.item_id ORDER BY a1.selling_price LIMIT 1
